survey.title: Your Experience with Government Offices
survey.subtitle: Help us build a better app

consent.title: Consent
consent.text:
I agree that my responses will be used anonymously for the development of the zetteln app.

My data will be:
- Stored anonymously (no names, no emails)
- Used only for this project
- Deleted after the project

Do you agree?

frequency.question: How often do you deal with government offices?

challenges.question: What do you find most difficult about dealing with government offices?

options.documents: I don't know which documents I need
options.help: I don't know where to get help

letterScenario.question: Imagine: You receive a letter from the job center or immigration office. What do you do first?

options.understand: I read it myself and usually understand it
options.askHelp: I read it but need to ask someone
options.giveAway: I immediately give it to someone who helps me
options.translate: I use Google Translate or similar apps
options.postpone: I put it aside for now

helpSource.question: Who usually helps you with government matters?

options.alone: No one, I do everything alone

missedDeadline.question: Have you ever missed something important (deadline, appointment, document) because you didn't understand a letter?

organization.question: How do you organize your important documents?

options.folder: I have a folder at home
options.bag: I keep everything in a bag/drawer
options.photos: I take photos with my phone
options.noSystem: I don't have a fixed method

smartphoneUsage.question: Do you use your smartphone for important things?

options.sometimes: Yes, sometimes (a few times per week)

appUsage.question: Have you ever used an app to help with government matters?

options.noButWould: No, but I would try it
options.noWont: No, I don't want to use an app for this

appPriorities.question: What is most important to you in an app for government help?

options.privacy: My data stays on my phone (not in the cloud)
options.multilingual: I can use the app in my language
options.guidance: The app explains what I need to do
options.organization: I can organize my documents there
